verses.1: Kumpipa Ahasueras in a ukna gam leitung le tuikulh tunga teengte tung panin siah kai hi.
verses.2: Ama vangliatna le a sepnate khempeuh le Mordekai tungah a piak minphatnate, Media le Persia Kumpiteʼ Khang Tangthu Laibu sungah kigelh hi.
verses.3: Bang hang hiam cih leh Kumpipa Ahasuerasʼ zomah Mordekai a lian pen ahi hi. Mordekai in ama miteʼ phattuam nading le a suanlekhakte uh a khantoh nading hanciam ahih manin Jew mite lakah mi lian khat hi a, a gam mihonpite in a it kim uh hi.
